properties.name: address
properties.label: Street Address
properties.description: Contact's street address, including apartment or unit number.

properties.name: annualrevenue
properties.label: Annual Revenue
properties.description: Annual company revenue

properties.name: associatedcompanyid
properties.label: Primary Associated Company ID
properties.description: HubSpot defined ID of a contact's primary associated company in HubSpot.

properties.name: associatedcompanylastupdated
properties.label: Associated Company Last Updated
properties.description: This field is meaningless on its own, and is solely used for triggering dynamic list updates when a company is updated

properties.name: city
properties.label: City
properties.description: A contact's city of residence

properties.name: closedate
properties.label: Close Date
properties.description: Date the  contact  became  a  customer. Set automatically when a deal or opportunity is marked as closed-won. It can also be set manually or programmatically.

properties.name: company
properties.label: Company Name
properties.description: Name of the contact's company. This can be set independently from the name property on the contact's associated company.

properties.name: company_size
properties.label: Company size
properties.description: Contact's company size. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: country
properties.label: Country/Region
properties.description: The contact's country/region of residence. This might be set via import, form, or integration.

properties.name: createdate
properties.label: Create Date
properties.description: The date that a contact entered the system

properties.name: currentlyinworkflow
properties.label: Currently in workflow (to be discontinued on April 18)
properties.description: True when contact is enrolled in a workflow.

properties.name: date_of_birth
properties.label: Date of birth
properties.description: Contact's date of birth. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: days_to_close
properties.label: Days To Close
properties.description: Count of days elapsed between creation and being closed as a customer. Set automatically.

properties.name: degree
properties.label: Degree
properties.description: Contact's degree. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: discord_id
properties.label: Discord ID
properties.description: This is the discord ID for the user

properties.name: email
properties.label: Email
properties.description: A contact's email address

properties.name: engagements_last_meeting_booked
properties.label: Date of last meeting booked in meetings tool
properties.description: The date of the last meeting that has been scheduled by a contact through the meetings tool. If multiple meetings have been scheduled, the date of the last chronological meeting in the timeline is shown.

properties.name: engagements_last_meeting_booked_campaign
properties.label: Campaign of last booking in meetings tool
properties.description: UTM parameter for marketing campaign (e.g. a specific email) responsible for recent meeting booking. Only populated when tracking parameters are included in meeting link.

properties.name: engagements_last_meeting_booked_medium
properties.label: Medium of last booking in meetings tool
properties.description: UTM parameter for the channel (e.g. email)  responsible for most recent meeting booking. Only populated when tracking parameters are included in meeting link.

properties.name: engagements_last_meeting_booked_source
properties.label: Source of last booking in meetings tool
properties.description: UTM parameter for the site (e.g. Twitter) responsible for most recent meeting booking. Only populated when tracking parameters are included in meeting link.

properties.name: fax
properties.label: Fax Number
properties.description: A contact's primary fax number

properties.name: field_of_study
properties.label: Field of study
properties.description: Contact's field of study. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: first_conversion_date
properties.label: First Conversion Date
properties.description: Date  this  contact  first  submitted  a  form.

properties.name: first_conversion_event_name
properties.label: First Conversion
properties.description: First form this contact submitted.

properties.name: first_deal_created_date
properties.label: First Deal Created Date
properties.description: Date first deal was created for contact. Set automatically.

properties.name: firstname
properties.label: First Name
properties.description: A contact's first name

properties.name: followercount
properties.label: Follower Count
properties.description: The number of Twitter followers a contact has

properties.name: gender
properties.label: Gender
properties.description: Contact's gender. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: graduation_date
properties.label: Graduation date
properties.description: Contact's graduation date. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: hs_additional_emails
properties.label: Additional email addresses
properties.description: A set of additional email addresses for a contact

properties.name: hs_all_accessible_team_ids
properties.label: All teams
properties.description: The team IDs, including the team hierarchy, of all default and custom owner properties for this record.

properties.name: hs_all_assigned_business_unit_ids
properties.label: Business units
properties.description: The business units this record is assigned to.

properties.name: hs_all_contact_vids
properties.label: All vids for a contact
properties.description: A set of all vids, canonical or otherwise, for a contact

properties.name: hs_all_owner_ids
properties.label: All owner IDs
properties.description: Values of all default and custom owner properties for this record.

properties.name: hs_all_team_ids
properties.label: All team IDs
properties.description: The team IDs of all default and custom owner properties for this record.

properties.name: hs_analytics_average_page_views
properties.label: Average Pageviews
properties.description: Average number of pageviews per session for this contact. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_first_referrer
properties.label: First Referring Site
properties.description: URL that referred the contact to your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_first_timestamp
properties.label: Time First Seen
properties.description: First time the contact has been seen. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_first_touch_converting_campaign
properties.label: First Touch Converting Campaign
properties.description: Campaign responsible for the first touch creation of this contact.

properties.name: hs_analytics_first_url
properties.label: First Page Seen
properties.description: First page the contact visited on your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_first_visit_timestamp
properties.label: Time of First Session
properties.description: First time the contact visited your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_last_referrer
properties.label: Last Referring Site
properties.description: Last URL that referred contact to your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_last_timestamp
properties.label: Time Last Seen
properties.description: Timestamp for most recent webpage view on your website.

properties.name: hs_analytics_last_touch_converting_campaign
properties.label: Last Touch Converting Campaign
properties.description: Campaign responsible for the last touch creation of this contact.

properties.name: hs_analytics_last_url
properties.label: Last Page Seen
properties.description: Last page the contact visited on your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_last_visit_timestamp
properties.label: Time of Last Session
properties.description: Timestamp for start of the most recent session for this contact to your website.

properties.name: hs_analytics_num_event_completions
properties.label: Number of event completions
properties.description: Total number of events for this contact. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_num_page_views
properties.label: Number of Pageviews
properties.description: Total number of page views this contact has had on your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_num_visits
properties.label: Number of Sessions
properties.description: Number of times a contact has come to your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_revenue
properties.label: Event Revenue
properties.description: Set event revenue on a contact though the Enterprise Events feature. http://help.hubspot.com/articles/KCS_Article/Reports/How-do-I-create-Events-in-HubSpot

properties.name: hs_analytics_source
properties.label: Original Traffic Source
properties.description: First known source the contact used to find your website. Set automatically, but may be updated manually.

properties.name: hs_analytics_source_data_1
properties.label: Original Traffic Source Drill-Down 1
properties.description: Additional information about the source the contact used to find your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_analytics_source_data_2
properties.label: Original Traffic Source Drill-Down 2
properties.description: Additional information about the source the contact used to find your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_associated_target_accounts
properties.label: Associated Target Accounts
properties.description: The number of target accounts associated with this contact

properties.name: hs_avatar_filemanager_key
properties.label: Avatar FileManager key
properties.description: The path in the FileManager CDN for this contact's avatar override image. Automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_buying_role
properties.label: Buying Role
properties.description: Role the contact plays during the sales process. Contacts can have multiple roles, and can share roles with others.

properties.name: hs_calculated_form_submissions
properties.label: The 800 most recent form submissions for a contact
properties.description: The 800 most recent form submissions for a contact

properties.name: hs_calculated_merged_vids
properties.label: Merged vids with timestamps of a contact
properties.description: Merged vids with timestamps of a contact

properties.name: hs_calculated_mobile_number
properties.label: Calculated Mobile Number in International Format
properties.description: Mobile number in international format

properties.name: hs_calculated_phone_number
properties.label: Calculated Phone Number in International Format
properties.description: Phone number in international format

properties.name: hs_calculated_phone_number_area_code
properties.label: Calculated Phone Number Area Code
properties.description: Area Code of the calculated phone number

properties.name: hs_calculated_phone_number_country_code
properties.label: Calculated Phone Number Country Code
properties.description: Country code of the calculated phone number

properties.name: hs_calculated_phone_number_region_code
properties.label: Calculated Phone Number Region
properties.description: ISO2 Country code for the derived phone number

properties.name: hs_clicked_linkedin_ad
properties.label: Clicked on a LinkedIn Ad
properties.description: Whether contact has clicked on a LinkedIn Ad

properties.name: hs_contact_enrichment_opt_out_timestamp
properties.label: Enrichment opt out timestamp
properties.description: Timestamp of when the contact opted out of being included in the HubSpot Enrichment database

properties.name: hs_content_membership_email
properties.label: Member email
properties.description: Email used to send private content information to members

properties.name: hs_content_membership_email_confirmed
properties.label: Email Confirmed
properties.description: Email Confirmation status of user of Content Membership

properties.name: hs_content_membership_follow_up_enqueued_at
properties.label: Time enrolled in registration follow up emails
properties.description: The time when the contact was first enrolled in the registration follow up email flow

properties.name: hs_content_membership_notes
properties.label: Membership Notes
properties.description: Notes relating to the contact's content membership.

properties.name: hs_content_membership_registered_at
properties.label: Registered At
properties.description: Datetime at which this user was set up for Content Membership

properties.name: hs_content_membership_registration_domain_sent_to
properties.label: Domain to which registration email was sent
properties.description: Domain to which the registration invitation email for Content Membership was sent to

properties.name: hs_content_membership_registration_email_sent_at
properties.label: Time registration email was sent
properties.description: Datetime at which this user was sent a registration invitation email for Content Membership

properties.name: hs_content_membership_status
properties.label: Status
properties.description: Status of the contact's content membership.

properties.name: hs_conversations_visitor_email
properties.label: Conversations visitor email
properties.description: A Conversations visitor's email address

properties.name: hs_count_is_unworked
properties.label: Count of unengaged contacts
properties.description: if contact is assigned and unworked, set to 1. if contact is assigned and worked, set to 0.

properties.name: hs_count_is_worked
properties.label: Count of engaged contacts
properties.description: if contact is assigned and worked, set to 1. if contact is assigned and unworked, set to 0.

properties.name: hs_country_region_code
properties.label: Country/Region Code
properties.description: The contact's two-letter country code.

properties.name: hs_created_by_conversations
properties.label: Created By Conversations
properties.description: Flag indicating this contact was created by the Conversations API

properties.name: hs_created_by_user_id
properties.label: Created by user ID
properties.description: The user who created this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_createdate
properties.label: Object create date/time
properties.description: The date and time at which this object was created. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

properties.name: hs_currently_enrolled_in_prospecting_agent
properties.label: Currently Enrolled in Prospecting Agent
properties.description: Indicates whether or not the contact has an active prospecting agent enrollment

properties.name: hs_data_privacy_ads_consent
properties.label: Ads Consent from Forms
properties.description: This property captures ads consents from forms and is used by consentmanager to create / update associated data privacy consent objects

properties.name: hs_date_entered_customer
properties.label: Date entered 'Customer (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)'
properties.description: The date and time when the contact entered the 'Customer' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.name: hs_date_entered_evangelist

properties.description: The date and time when the contact entered the 'Evangelist' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.description: The date and time when the contact entered the 'Lead' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.description: The date and time when the contact entered the 'Sales Qualified Lead' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.description: The date and time when the contact entered the 'Subscriber' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.description: The date and time when the contact exited the 'Customer' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.description: The date and time when the contact exited the 'Evangelist' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.name: hs_date_exited_lead
properties.label: Date exited 'Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)'
properties.description: The date and time when the contact exited the 'Lead' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.name: hs_date_exited_marketingqualifiedlead
properties.label: Date exited 'Marketing Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)'
properties.description: The date and time when the contact exited the 'Marketing Qualified Lead' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.name: hs_date_exited_opportunity
properties.label: Date exited 'Opportunity (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)'
properties.description: The date and time when the contact exited the 'Opportunity' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.name: hs_date_exited_other
properties.label: Date exited 'Other (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)'
properties.description: The date and time when the contact exited the 'Other' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.name: hs_date_exited_salesqualifiedlead
properties.label: Date exited 'Sales Qualified Lead (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)'
properties.description: The date and time when the contact exited the 'Sales Qualified Lead' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.name: hs_date_exited_subscriber
properties.label: Date exited 'Subscriber (Lifecycle Stage Pipeline)'
properties.description: The date and time when the contact exited the 'Subscriber' stage, 'Lifecycle Stage Pipeline' pipeline

properties.name: hs_document_last_revisited
properties.label: Recent Document Revisit Date
properties.description: The last time a shared document (presentation) was accessed by this contact

properties.name: hs_email_bad_address
properties.label: Invalid email address
properties.description: The email address associated with this contact is invalid.

properties.name: hs_email_bounce
properties.label: Marketing emails bounced
properties.description: The number of marketing emails that bounced for the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_click
properties.label: Marketing emails clicked
properties.description: The number of marketing emails which have had link clicks for the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_customer_quarantined_reason
properties.label: Email address quarantine reason
properties.description: The reason why the email address has been quarantined.

properties.name: hs_email_delivered
properties.label: Marketing emails delivered
properties.description: The number of marketing emails delivered for the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_domain
properties.label: Email Domain
properties.description: A contact's email address domain

properties.name: hs_email_first_click_date
properties.label: First marketing email click date
properties.description: The date of the earliest link click for any marketing email to the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_first_open_date
properties.label: First marketing email open date
properties.description: The date of the earliest open for any marketing email to the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_first_reply_date
properties.label: First marketing email reply date
properties.description: The date of the earliest reply for any marketing email to the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_first_send_date
properties.label: First marketing email send date
properties.description: The date of the earliest delivery for any marketing email to the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_hard_bounce_reason
properties.label: Email hard bounce reason
properties.description: The issue that caused a contact to hard bounce from your emails. If this is an error or a temporary issue, you can unbounce this contact from the contact record.

properties.name: hs_email_hard_bounce_reason_enum
properties.label: Email hard bounce reason
properties.description: The issue that caused a contact to hard bounce from your emails. If this is an error or a temporary issue, you can unbounce this contact from the contact record.

properties.name: hs_email_is_ineligible
properties.label: Is globally ineligible
properties.description: Indicates the contact is globally ineligible for email.

properties.name: hs_email_last_click_date
properties.label: Last marketing email click date
properties.description: The date of the most recent link click for any marketing email to the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_last_email_name
properties.label: Last marketing email name
properties.description: The name of the last marketing email sent to the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_last_open_date
properties.label: Last marketing email open date
properties.description: The date of the most recent open for any marketing email to the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_last_reply_date
properties.label: Last marketing email reply date
properties.description: The date of the latest reply for any marketing email to the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_last_send_date
properties.label: Last marketing email send date
properties.description: The date of the most recent delivery for any marketing email to the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_open
properties.label: Marketing emails opened
properties.description: The number of marketing emails opened for the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_optimal_send_day_of_week
properties.label: Optimal Marketing Email Send Day of Week

properties.name: hs_email_optimal_send_time_of_day
properties.label: Optimal Marketing Email Send Time of Day

properties.name: hs_email_optout
properties.label: Unsubscribed from all email
properties.description: Indicates that the current email address has opted out of all email.

properties.name: hs_email_optout_701694364
properties.label: Opted out of email: Marketing Information
properties.description: Indicates that the current email address has opted out of this email type.

properties.name: hs_email_optout_701694365
properties.label: Opted out of email: One to One
properties.description: Indicates that the current email address has opted out of this email type.

properties.name: hs_email_quarantined
properties.label: Email Address Quarantined
properties.description: Indicates that the current email address has been quarantined for anti-abuse reasons and any marketing email sends to it will be blocked. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_quarantined_reason
properties.label: Email address automated quarantine reason
properties.description: The automated reason why the email address has been quarantined.

properties.name: hs_email_recipient_fatigue_recovery_time
properties.label: Email Address Recipient Fatigue Next Available Sending Time
properties.description: When this recipient has reached the limit of email sends per time period, this property indicates the next available time to send. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_replied
properties.label: Marketing emails replied
properties.description: The number of marketing emails replied to by the current email address. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_email_sends_since_last_engagement
properties.label: Sends Since Last Engagement
properties.description: The number of marketing emails that have been sent to the current email address since the last engagement (open or link click). This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_emailconfirmationstatus
properties.label: Marketing email confirmation status
properties.description: The status of a contact's eligibility to receive marketing email. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_enriched_email_bounce_detected
properties.label: Enriched Email Bounce Detected
properties.description: Bounce Detected attribute is populated when Hubspot & itâ€™s partners identify the email may not be deliverable or is no longer valid for that contact.

properties.name: hs_facebook_ad_clicked
properties.label: Clicked Facebook ad
properties.description: Whether contact has clicked a Facebook ad

properties.name: hs_facebookid
properties.label: Facebook ID
properties.description: A contact's facebook id

properties.name: hs_feedback_last_nps_follow_up
properties.label: Last NPS survey comment
properties.description: Last NPS survey comment that this contact gave

properties.name: hs_feedback_last_nps_rating
properties.label: Last NPS survey rating
properties.description: Last NPS survey rating that this contact gave

properties.name: hs_feedback_last_survey_date
properties.label: Last NPS survey date
properties.description: The time that this contact last submitted a NPS survey response. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_feedback_show_nps_web_survey
properties.label: Should be shown an NPS web survey
properties.description: Whether or not a contact should be shown an NPS web survey. This is automatically set by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_first_closed_order_id
properties.label: First Closed Order ID
properties.description: The id of the associated order that was first to be closed

properties.name: hs_first_engagement_object_id
properties.label: ID of first engagement
properties.description: The object id of the current contact owner's first engagement with the contact.

properties.name: hs_first_order_closed_date
properties.label: First Order Closed Date
properties.description: Date first order was closed. Set Automatically

properties.name: hs_first_outreach_date
properties.label: First outreach date
properties.description: The date of the first outreach (call, email, meeting or other communication) from a sales rep to the contact.

properties.name: hs_first_subscription_create_date
properties.label: First subscription create date
properties.description: The create date of the first subscription by the contact.

properties.name: hs_full_name_or_email
properties.label: Full name or email
properties.description: A contact's full name, formatting first name and last name by I18n/utils/formatName, fall back to email.

properties.name: hs_googleplusid
properties.label: googleplus ID
properties.description: A contact's googleplus id

properties.name: hs_has_active_subscription
properties.label: Contact has an active subscription
properties.description: The rollup property value is 1 when the contact has an active Subscription or 0 otherwise.

properties.name: hs_ip_timezone
properties.label: IP Timezone
properties.description: The timezone reported by a contact's IP address. This is automatically set by HubSpot and can be used for segmentation and reporting.

properties.name: hs_is_contact
properties.label: Is a contact
properties.description: Is a contact, has not been deleted and is not a visitor

properties.name: hs_is_enriched
properties.label: Has been enriched
properties.description: Indicates whether this object has ever had enriched properties written to it.

properties.name: hs_is_unworked
properties.label: Contact unworked
properties.description: Contact  has  not  been  assigned  or  has  not  been  engaged  after  last  owner  assignment/re-assignment

properties.name: hs_journey_stage
properties.label: Journey Stage
properties.description: Track the status of a contact through a customer journey. It can be set through journeys, manually on a per contact basis, and through other tools.

properties.name: hs_language
properties.label: Preferred language
properties.description: Set your contact's preferred language for communications. This property can be changed from an import, form, or integration.

properties.name: hs_last_metered_enrichment_timestamp
properties.label: Last Metered Enrichment Timestamp
properties.description: The timestamp of the most recent enrichment to this object via Breeze Intelligence

properties.name: hs_last_sales_activity_date
properties.label: last sales activity date old
properties.description: The date of the last sales activity with the contact. This property is set automatically by HubSpot. Note: This field is only updated for contacts with an owner.

properties.name: hs_last_sales_activity_timestamp
properties.label: Last Engagement Date
properties.description: The last time a contact engaged with your site or a form, document, meetings link, or tracked email. This doesn't include marketing emails or emails to multiple contacts.

properties.name: hs_last_sales_activity_type
properties.label: Last Engagement Type
properties.description: The type of the last engagement a contact performed. This doesn't include marketing emails or emails to multiple contacts.

properties.name: hs_lastmodifieddate
properties.label: Object last modified date/time
properties.description: Most recent timestamp of any property update for this contact. This includes HubSpot internal properties, which can be visible or hidden. This property is updated automatically.

properties.name: hs_latest_disqualified_lead_date
properties.label: Latest Disqualified Lead Date
properties.description: The most recent time at which an associated lead currently in a disqualified stage was moved to that stage

properties.name: hs_latest_meeting_activity
properties.label: Latest meeting activity
properties.description: The date of the most recent meeting (past or upcoming) logged for, scheduled with, or booked by this contact.

properties.name: hs_latest_open_lead_date
properties.label: Latest Open Lead Date
properties.description: The most recent time an associated open lead was moved to a NEW or IN_PROGRESS state

properties.name: hs_latest_qualified_lead_date
properties.label: Latest Qualified Lead Date
properties.description: The most recent time at which an associated lead currently in a qualified stage was moved to that stage

properties.name: hs_latest_sequence_ended_date
properties.label: Last sequence ended date
properties.description: The last sequence ended date.

properties.name: hs_latest_sequence_enrolled
properties.label: Last sequence enrolled
properties.description: The last sequence enrolled.

properties.name: hs_latest_sequence_enrolled_date
properties.label: Last sequence enrolled date
properties.description: The last sequence enrolled date.

properties.name: hs_latest_sequence_finished_date
properties.label: Last sequence finished date
properties.description: The last sequence finished date.

properties.name: hs_latest_sequence_unenrolled_date
properties.label: Last sequence unenrolled date
properties.description: The last sequence unenrolled date.

properties.name: hs_latest_source
properties.label: Latest Traffic Source
properties.description: The source of the latest session for a contact

properties.name: hs_latest_source_data_1
properties.label: Latest Traffic Source Drill-Down 1
properties.description: Additional information about the latest source for the last session the contact used to find your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_latest_source_data_2
properties.label: Latest Traffic Source Drill-Down 2
properties.description: Additional information about the source for the last session the contact used to find your website. Set automatically.

properties.name: hs_latest_source_timestamp
properties.label: Latest Traffic Source Date
properties.description: The time of the latest session for a contact

properties.name: hs_lifecyclestage_other_date

properties.name: hs_linkedin_url

properties.name: hs_live_enrichment_deadline

properties.description: Deadline for freshly sourced enrichment data to be applied and cause a credit metering

properties.name: hs_marketable_reason_id

properties.name: hs_marketable_reason_type
properties.label: Marketing contact status source type
properties.description: The type of the activity that set the contact as a marketing contact

properties.name: hs_marketable_status
properties.label: Marketing contact status
properties.description: The marketing status of a contact

properties.name: hs_marketable_until_renewal

properties.name: hs_membership_has_accessed_private_content

properties.description: 1 if a member has accessed any private content, 0 or null if not

properties.name: hs_membership_last_private_content_access_date
properties.label: Membership last private content access date
properties.description: The last date a contact accessed private content

properties.name: hs_merged_object_ids
properties.label: Merged Contact IDs
properties.description: The list of Contact record IDs that have been merged into this Contact. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_mobile_sdk_push_tokens
properties.label: Mobile Sdk Push Tokens
properties.description: This property is used to capture the push notification token for use on the LiveChat mobile sdk. We intend to use this property to store a list of push tokens (as they refresh) on the CONTACT object.

properties.name: hs_notes_last_activity
properties.label: Last Activity
properties.description: The coordinates of the last activity for a contact. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions in the contact record.

properties.name: hs_notes_next_activity
properties.label: Next Activity
properties.description: The coordinates of the next upcoming activity for a contact. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions in the contact record.

properties.name: hs_notes_next_activity_type
properties.label: Next Activity Type
properties.description: The type of the next upcoming activity for a contact. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions in the contact record.

properties.description: The unique ID for this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

properties.name: hs_object_source_detail_3

properties.description: Third level of detail on how this record was created.

properties.label: Record source

properties.name: hs_object_source_user_id

properties.description: Raw internal userId present in the RequestMeta when this record was created.

properties.name: hs_predictivecontactscore

properties.description: A score calculated by HubSpot that represents a contact's likelihood to become a customer

properties.name: hs_predictivecontactscore_v2
properties.label: Likelihood to close
properties.description: The probability that a contact will become a customer within the next 90 days. This score is based on standard contact properties and behavior.

properties.name: hs_predictivecontactscorebucket
properties.label: Lead Rating
properties.description: The rating of this contact based on their predictive lead score

properties.name: hs_predictivescoringtier

properties.description: A ranking system of contacts evenly assigned into four tiers. Contacts in tier one are more likely to become customers than contacts in tier four.

properties.name: hs_prospecting_agent_actively_enrolled_count
properties.label: Prospecting Agent Actively Enrolled Count
properties.description: The number of active prospecting agent enrollments this contact has. This should be either 0 or 1

properties.name: hs_quarantined_emails
properties.label: Quarantined Emails
properties.description: Lists all emails associated with this contact that have been quarantined, with a source and reason.

properties.name: hs_read_only
properties.label: Read only object
properties.description: Determines whether a record can be edited by a user.

properties.name: hs_recent_closed_order_date

properties.name: hubspot_team_id

properties.description: The team of the owner of a contact.

properties.name: ip_country_code

properties.description: The country code reported by a contact's IP address. This is automatically set by HubSpot and can be used for segmentation and reporting.

properties.name: kloutscoregeneral

properties.name: linkedinbio

properties.name: linkedinconnections

properties.name: marital_status
properties.label: Marital Status
properties.description: Contact's marital status. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: message

properties.description: A default property to be used for any message or comments a contact may want to leave on a form.

properties.name: military_status

properties.description: Contact's military status. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: mobilephone

properties.description: A contact's mobile phone number

properties.name: notes_last_contacted
properties.label: Last Contacted
properties.description: The last time a call, chat conversation, LinkedIn message, postal mail, meeting, sales email, SMS, or WhatsApp message was logged for a contact. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions in the contact record.

properties.name: notes_last_updated
properties.label: Last Activity Date
properties.description: The last time a call, chat conversation, LinkedIn message, postal mail, meeting, note, sales email, SMS, or WhatsApp message was logged for a contact. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions in the contact record.

properties.name: notes_next_activity_date
properties.label: Next Activity Date
properties.description: The date of the next upcoming activity for a contact. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions in the contact record.

properties.name: num_associated_deals
properties.label: Number of Associated Deals
properties.description: Count of deals associated with this contact. Set automatically by HubSpot.

properties.name: num_contacted_notes
properties.label: Number of times contacted
properties.description: The number of times a call, chat conversation, LinkedIn message, postal mail, meeting, sales email, SMS, or WhatsApp message was logged for a contact record. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions in the contact record.

properties.name: num_conversion_events
properties.label: Number of Form Submissions
properties.description: The number of forms this contact has submitted

properties.name: num_notes
properties.label: Number of Sales Activities
properties.description: The number of times a call, chat conversation, LinkedIn message, postal mail, meeting, note, sales email, SMS, task, or WhatsApp message was logged for a contact record. This is set automatically by HubSpot based on user actions in the contact record.

properties.name: num_unique_conversion_events
properties.label: Number of Unique Forms Submitted
properties.description: The number of different forms this contact has submitted

properties.name: numemployees
properties.label: Number of Employees
properties.description: The number of company employees

properties.name: owneremail
properties.label: HubSpot Owner Email (legacy)
properties.description: A legacy property used to identify the email address of the owner of the contact. This property is no longer in use.

properties.name: ownername
properties.label: HubSpot Owner Name (legacy)
properties.description: A legacy property used to identify the name of the owner of the contact. This property is no longer in use.

properties.name: phone
properties.label: Phone Number
properties.description: A contact's primary phone number

properties.name: photo
properties.label: Photo
properties.description: Social Media photo

properties.name: recent_conversion_date
properties.label: Recent Conversion Date
properties.description: The date this contact last submitted a form

properties.name: recent_conversion_event_name
properties.label: Recent Conversion
properties.description: The last form this contact submitted

properties.name: recent_deal_amount
properties.label: Recent Deal Amount
properties.description: Amount of last closed won deal associated with a contact. Set automatically.

properties.name: recent_deal_close_date
properties.label: Recent Deal Close Date
properties.description: Date last deal associated with contact was closed-won. Set automatically.

properties.name: relationship_status
properties.label: Relationship Status
properties.description: Contact's relationship status. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: salutation
properties.label: Salutation
properties.description: The title used to address a contact

properties.name: school
properties.label: School
properties.description: Contact's school. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: seniority
properties.label: Seniority
properties.description: Contact's seniority. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: start_date
properties.label: Start date
properties.description: Contact's start date. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: state
properties.label: State/Region
properties.description: The contact's state of residence. This might be set via import, form, or integration.

properties.name: surveymonkeyeventlastupdated
properties.label: SurveyMonkey Event Last Updated
properties.description: This field is meaningless on its own, and is solely used for triggering dynamic list updates when SurveyMonkey information is updated

properties.name: total_revenue
properties.label: Total Revenue
properties.description: Sum of all closed-won deal revenue associated with the contact. Set automatically.

properties.name: twitterbio
properties.label: Twitter Bio
properties.description: The contact's Twitter bio. This is set by HubSpot using the contact's email address.

properties.name: twitterhandle
properties.label: Twitter Username
properties.description: The contact's Twitter handle.

properties.name: twitterprofilephoto
properties.label: Twitter Profile Photo
properties.description: The contact's Twitter profile photo. This is set by HubSpot using the contact's email address.

properties.name: webinareventlastupdated
properties.label: Webinar Event Last Updated
properties.description: This field is meaningless on its own, and is solely used for triggering dynamic list updates when webinar information is updated

properties.name: website
properties.label: Website URL
properties.description: Associated company website.

properties.name: work_email
properties.label: Work email
properties.description: Contact's work email. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

properties.name: zip
properties.label: Postal Code
properties.description: The contact's zip code. This might be set via import, form, or integration.

twitterProperties.description: The number of times a contact clicked on links you shared on Twitter through HubSpot. This is set automatically by HubSpot and can be used for segmentation.
twitterProperties.label: Twitter Clicks
twitterProperties.name: hs_social_twitter_clicks

twitterProperties.description: The contact's Twitter bio. This is set by HubSpot using the contact's email address.
twitterProperties.label: Twitter Bio
twitterProperties.name: twitterbio

twitterProperties.description: The contact's Twitter profile photo. This is set by HubSpot using the contact's email address.
twitterProperties.label: Twitter Profile Photo
twitterProperties.name: twitterprofilephoto

discordProperties.description: This is the discord ID for the user
discordProperties.label: Discord ID
discordProperties.name: discord_id
